meanings.definition: A woman who performs in chorus lines.
meanings.sent1: The talented chorines danced gracefully in perfect synchronization.
meanings.sent2: The theater production featured a group of talented chorines.
meanings.sent3: The chorines accidentally bumped into each other on stage, causing a funny moment.
meanings.sent4: The chorines were like colorful flowers blooming in unison on the stage.
meanings.sent5: The audience was mesmerized by the beauty and elegance of the chorines' performance.

meanings.sent1: In the musical, there were multiple chorines singing and dancing.
meanings.sent2: The show's finale included a large group of chorines.
meanings.sent3: The chorines decided to form a band and tour the country together.
meanings.sent4: The city streets were filled with the laughter of the chorines as they celebrated their success.
meanings.sent5: The bright costumes of the chorines lit up the stage like a rainbow.
